about_the_game:
Suddenly, the Lime aliens appeared and started capturing Earthlings everywhere. The special operations team of the Earth Defense Force, played by the players, is entrusted with a mission in this critical moment. They penetrate deep into the occupied areas of the Lime aliens to rescue the wounded, gather intelligence, and seek a turning point for resistance. Use rocket jumps and power hammers to break through various traps set by the Lime aliens. Step forward in the nick of time to save the world! The game also includes excitingly presented story animations and thrilling boss battles. To achieve the best gaming experience, the game supports the use of gamepads from multiple brands and types simultaneously.

Time is life. Don't stop moving forward!

[Game Features of "Alien Dash"]

  • It integrates various practical and efficient tools such as rocket backpacks, power hammers, rescue ladders, etc. You can switch and use them flexibly to overcome all obstacles on your way through the levels.

  • Team members not only need to break through the traps in the occupied areas of the Lime aliens but also must complete multiple tasks required by the headquarters within a limited time.

  • There are five environments including cities, oceans, bases, space, and the Lime planet. The levels are designed with a vast amount of unique and non - repetitive content.

[Brave Team Members Charge Forward ]

The game supports local/online play for 1 - 4 users simultaneously. You can join the online experience through friend invitations.

[Keep the Mission in Mind and Never Fail ]

Team members not only have to break through the traps and mechanisms in the areas occupied by the Lime Aliens, but also must complete multiple tasks required by the headquarters within the specified time.

[Conquer Every Challenging Level ]

With five distinct environments - city, ocean, base, space, and the planet Lime, the game features a vast number of uniquely designed levels. No two levels are alike.

[Relaxed]

This isn't a game to make you suffer. Besides the enjoyable level - clearing gameplay, you'll also experience:

A plot full of twists and turns

Excitingly presented cut - scenes

Well - designed BOSS battles

name: Alien Rush

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / AMD RX 560, 2GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Rush! supports both keyboard and controller, and therefore please choose corresponding controller configuration on Steam setting before starting the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit / Windows 11, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7500K / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 12 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 580, 4GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alien Rush! supports both keyboard and controller, and therefore please choose corresponding controller configuration on Steam setting before starting the game.

short_description: "Alien Rush" is a level - challenging party game integrating platform - hopping and action - solving puzzles. It allows 1 to 4 players to play locally or online. Players can utilize rocket jumps and power hammers to surmount various traps set by the Lime invaders.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
